p: The plant species with the highest Frequency of Citation (FC) were Ochna kirkii Oliv. (FC = 5), Ehretia amoena Klotzsch and Pteleopsis myrtifolia (M.A.Lawson) Engl. & Diels (FC = 3). Thirteen plant species presented a FC of 2 each, and the remaining plants were cited by only one traditional healer each (FC = 1) (Table 1). Table 2 presents the ICF values for the different ailment categories.
